but I got so hot that I just kept coming

Will climbs up on a nearby rock.
\n<Sebastian>That was really brave.\. I couldn't do that,
\n<Juan>Oh, c'mon Seb.\. At least it's not as high as
the jump into the Waterfall.\. Remember that?
\n<Will>It's so hot out there.\. Shouldn't we bring,
\n<Sebastian>How are we gonna hold it, though?
\n<Sebastian>I already tried that, all I got were...
Use 2 \c[3]Jelly Orbs\c[0] to build four Jelly Containers?\.\.
You're too thirsty to pass on this idea.
\n<Will>Holy shit, how did you do that?
\n<Waliullah>It's this weird jelly ability that he has.
\n<Sebastian>Yeah.\. But now we all have containers!
You each pick up one container,\. and fill it with oasis
